overview: Live Blu-ray features footage of the biggest anime song live "Animelo Summer Live 2008 -Challenge-" on August 31, 2008 at Saitama Super Arena on two discs. Stars Aya Hirano, Haruko Momoi, May'n, Yoshiki Fukuyama, Aki Misato, JAM Project, and plenty more!
title: Animelo Summer Live 2008 -Challenge- 8.31
